item.title: neozorba@nixlab - A highly opinionated, minimalist, declarative Kubernetes homelab
item.description: A self-hosted, NixOS-powered homelab running a lightweight Kubernetes cluster via k3s, complete with monitoring and dashboards; all declaratively managed and exposed via local DNS. I’ve shared this setup within my close circle and hobby clubs. Figured out it’s time to put it out here too. neozorba@nixlab.local Full setup here → neozorba-nixlab.local
